name: Feline Fishing
description:
Direct character by clicking mouse at destination you want him to go

Cast= hover cursor over water until crosshair appears then press and hold E  release when meter is full for max accuracy

Once fish is on the line a series of letter commands will appear

Type the sequence letters as you see them before the timer runs out to catch the fish!

 Look for The Golden Catfish!

Web Version is pretty laggy. Play on Windows if possible
